description:
This course is a very detailed lectures explaining how to use a stop loss. If you are a trader this course is a must. Protecting our trades from big losses is the first step to success. This course has two sections. The first section is about the definition of a stop loss and its uses. The second section deals with details about all types of stop loss. Examples are given for each type. 

This course will teach you everything you need to protect your investment from bigger losses. This calculation is very simple and easy to implement, but each trader have to do his own calculations according to simple and easy ways and strategies.
title: How to Protect your Trades Using a Stop Loss?
